meanings.sent1: I retaped the box to make sure it stayed closed.
meanings.sent2: She retaped the torn paper to fix it.
meanings.sent3: The cat retaped the yarn ball, thinking it was a new toy.
meanings.sent4: The teacher retaped the students' attention with an engaging story.
meanings.sent5: He retaped the memory in his mind, making it clearer.

meanings.sent1: The package arrived retaped, indicating it had been opened.
meanings.sent2: She found the book retaped on the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The magician's hat flew off, only to land retaped on his head.
meanings.sent4: The old photo was retaped in her heart, bringing back memories.
meanings.sent5: The music played retaped in the background, adding to the atmosphere.
